comments:
I don't know what I have done to get this error. But maybe someone knows the cause

java.lang.LinkageError: Class org/eclipse/dstore/extra/internal/extra/DomainNotifier violates loader constraints
at org.eclipse.rse.connectorservice.dstore.DStoreConnectorService.internalConnect(DStoreConnectorService.java:782)
at org.eclipse.rse.core.subsystems.AbstractConnectorService.connect(AbstractConnectorService.java:798)
at org.eclipse.rse.core.subsystems.SubSystem.internalConnect(SubSystem.java:2776)
at org.eclipse.rse.core.subsystems.SubSystem$ConnectJob.performOperation(SubSystem.java:1612)
at org.eclipse.rse.core.subsystems.SubSystem$SubSystemOperationJob.run(SubSystem.java:1327)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Can you please Help > About > Configuration Details, Copy&Paste it into a file and attach the config?

I just realized that ssomething was wrong with my configuration: I removed all *rse* plugins and installed the latest drop (+ the examples and experimental plugins). The problem is gone now....

I still have the buggy configuration around, if that helps.

Hm, weird.

If you have time, it might be helpful if you could do 'Help > About Eclipse > Configuration Details > Copy to Clipboard", paste into a file and attach it to this bug for both the working and the failing configuration.

I'm marking the bug as INVALID for now.
Marking as INVALID since it seems the config was wrong.
